New Records: Brandon Miller scored a season-high in tonight's game
Key Match Events: The Hornets dominated the second half, outscoring the Pacers by 29 points in the last 18 minutes of action
Post-Match Reflections: Brandon Miller and LaMelo Ball's partnership is a'scary sight', according to Miller
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Hornets' ability to take punches and keep rolling is inspiring, with a blueprint that dominated last season's Eastern Conference runners-up
Others: The duo of LaMelo Ball and Brandon Miller are unlike anything the city of Charlotte has seen on a basketball court
